snippet.title: The Junkyard - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The Junkyard is a shooter, horror and adventure game. Explore a network of tunnels that lead to several different rooms. There are various creatures to frighten and hinder you, which grow stronger and more numerous. Defeat bosses. Experience the dramatic and mysterious plot of the life of Joseph, the main character, but be careful not to go mad...

Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3488500?utm_campaign=early_access
Instagram: instagram.com/portlandgamesinc
